Uses of Class
de.nec.nle.siafu.model.Overlay

  • Packages that use Overlay 
    Package Description
    de.nec.nle.siafu.behaviormodels
    This package contains the three models that you will have to override in order to implement your simulation, namely the behavior of agents, places and the evoution of context data.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics
    Anything that relates to the graphical user interface of Siafu is contained in this package.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel
    This package contains the classes relted to the Control Panel, that is, the right side panel of Siafu when a simulation is running.
    de.nec.nle.siafu.model
    This package roughly contains all the modelled data objects.

    • Uses of Overlay in de.nec.nle.siafu.behaviormodels

      Method parameters in de.nec.nle.siafu.behaviormodels with type arguments of type Overlay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract void BaseContextModel.createOverlays(ArrayList<Overlay> olList)
      This method recieves the overlays that have been created from the images in the simulation data.
      abstract void BaseContextModel.doIteration(Map<String,Overlay> overlays)
      The parameter overlays contains the overlays defined in the image maps, the developer can add or modify overlay values at will.

    • Uses of Overlay in de.nec.nle.siafu.model

      Subclasses of Overlay in de.nec.nle.siafu.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BinaryOverlay
      A binary overlay returns a BooleanType object (a publishable boolean) set to true or false depending on whether the value at a given postion is above or below a unique threshold.
      class  DiscreteOverlay
      A discrete overlay returns it's value as a Text object according to the provided thresholds.
      class  RealOverlay
      A real overlay does not perform any mapping between the matrix values and the returned value.
      Methods in de.nec.nle.siafu.model that return Overlay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Overlay Overlay.getOverlay(String name, InputStream is, org.apache.commons.configuration.Configuration simulationConfig)
      Get an instance of Overlay which fits the particular overlay defined in the simulation data.
      Methods in de.nec.nle.siafu.model that return types with arguments of type Overlay 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SortedMap<String,Overlay> World.getOverlays()
      Get the overlays being simulated.
